    Why #Test
    Challenge

    The beginning of 2020 has brought upon us difficult and uncertain times that are challenging our capabilities and testing our resilience.‚Äã

    Yet, it has also given us the opportunity to reignite our sense of community and rethink a new tomorrow.

    We want to support our society, strengthen our resilience and help the economy, to have a quick return to a new and better normality for millions of citizens globally affected by the COVID-19 crisis.

    #test

    Let's team up in this global challenge to support our society, help the economy, and reinvent the world together.

    Our purpose

    Calling for initiatives to boost the world‚Äôs recovery

    SHORTEN THE
    IMPACT

    Mitigate the impact of this crisis in the short term focusing on the most affected

    RAMP-UP OUR
    ECONOMY

    Help rebound the core socio-economic systems recover activity levels in an innovative and safe manner

    STRENGHEN OUR
    RESILIENCE

    Develop resilient societies, cities and living systems, to better face future challenges

    Let‚Äôs reinvent the world together

    We are looking for startups to

    Revamp the economy through sustainable growth

    Support workers, entrepreneurs and employer's recovery, promoting sustainable initiatives and living standards.

    EXAMPLES

    • 01 /Employment recovery
    • 02 /SMEs business activity
    • 03 /Liquidity schemes
    • 04 /Pandemic / Crisis preparedness
    • 05 /Leverage newly-created sustenaible levels

    Enhance cities and infrastructure adaptiveness and resilience

    Re-design our cities and re-invent infrastructure to better prepare it to prevent and battle against future societal issues and climate challenges.

    EXAMPLES

    • 01 /Adaptable cities and spaces
    • 02 /Multi-purpose infraestructure
    • 03 /Digital ready infraestructure
    • 04 /Supply chain continuity & resiliency

    Ensure life continuity & Boost social community

    Help society to start again after lockdown period, re-boosting our communities and key sectors in safe and innovative ways (e.g. education, hospitality, social life).

    EXAMPLES

    • 01 /Overcome social distancing
    • 02 /Community reach schemes
    • 03 /Digital education
    • 04 /Help society to start again after lockdown period

    How it works

    KICK-OFF AND SUBMISSION

    15th MAY

    Start

    Online platform open for submission

    JUN

    Submission phase

    4 weeks open for startup submission

    COMPETITION

    JUL

    Finalist selection

    Partners select the 9 best proposals based on its social and economic impact, feasibility, and implementation timeline

    SEP

    Digital Pitchday

    Presenting for top-level judges and broadcast live

    DEPLOYMENT

    SEP

    Next steps

    Three winners will have access to capital, partners resources, acceleration, media exposure, and partners' network

    SEP

    Implementation

    The winners with the Partners support will deploy their initiatives to make a real impact in our society
